result.arabic_text: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
result.translation: Alif Laam Raa.[1] Iyo ni imirongo (ayat) y’igitabo, ikaba (n’imirongo ya) Qur’an isobanutse.
result.footnotes: [1] Isura zitangirwa n’inyuguti nk’izi, twazivuzeho mu masura yatambutse, urugero Surat Al Baqarat.
